ingredients.ingredient: 1 (1 pound) loaf Italian bread, cut into 1/2 inch slices

cookingTips: Soften butter slightly so the garlic powder and parsley distribute evenly
Toast the garlic powder in a dry pan for a few seconds before mixing to deepen its flavor
Broil rather than bake for faster melting and better cheese browning
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Guide the user on spreading the garlic butter evenly and deciding whether to broil or bake for optimal cheese melt and crust texture.
